title: Russian Tanker Reaches Venezuela After Evading U.S. Warship
summary: A sanctioned Russian shadow fleet tanker has reached Venezuela’s waters after evading a U.S. destroyer. title: Gulf Coast Pipeline Boom Marks Largest Natural Gas Expansion Since 2008
summary: A massive pipeline buildout is sweeping across Texas, Louisiana, and Oklahoma, marking the largest expansion of Gulf Coast natural-gas capacity since the 2008 shale boom, according to Bloomberg. title: JP Morgan Says Oil Prices Could Plunge Into $30s by 2027
summary: The international crude benchmark, Brent, could dip to the $30s per barrel handle by 2027 as oversupply could overwhelm the market, according to a JP Morgan forecast posted by users on X. Brent Crude prices have dropped by 14% year to date, and traded relatively stable at $62.59 per barrel early on…

title: LNG Shipping Rates Surge to Two-Year High as U.S. Exports Soar
summary: Spot charter rates to hire an LNG tanker on the U.S. to Europe route have jumped to their highest level in nearly two years as soaring American exports tighten the Atlantic LNG vessels market. title: From gold giant to boardroom bust-up: Barrick weighs break-up
summary: An activist investor building a stake and the sudden departure of its boss have put pressure on the gold miner to break up
